description: Try this twist on the classic sausage roll. This recipe uses devon mixed with herbs like paprika, cumin and fennel seed.
name: Devon Sausage Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 210 degrees fan forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Use the shredding attachment on your food processor to break the devon down to mince. Add the garlic and onion and pulse a few times to combine it all through the mince.
Put the mince into a bowl, add the spices and mix them through the meat.

Cut each pastry sheet in half and spread the devon mixture along the middle of the sheet. Roll the pastry around the meat, then seal the edge with water or egg wash. Cut the roll into preferred size and place each one on the prepared baking tray.

Brush each roll with the egg wash (optional: sprinkle with caraway seeds) and pop them in the oven. Cook for 20 minutes at 210C FF then reduce the oven temperature down to 180C FF for a further 15 - 20 minutes.
Keep an eye on the sausage rolls while they are cooking as times may vary depending on your oven. Makes 16 rolls.
